content: --कूल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} unfavourable, adverse, contrary, hostile, opposite, प्रतिकूलतामुपगते हि विधौ विफलत्वमेति बहुसाधनता <ls>Śi. 9. 6</ls>; <ls>Ku. 3. 24.</ls> {2} harsh, discordant, unpleasant, disagreeable; अप्यन्नपुष्टा प्रतिकूलशब्दा <ls>Ku. 1. 45.</ls> {3} inauspicious. {4} contradictory. {5} reverse, inverted. {6} perverse, cross, peevish, stubborn. °आचरणं °आचरितं any offensive or hostile action or conduct; <ls>R. 8. 81.</ls> °उक्तं -क्तिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} a contradiction.
--कूलं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {1} adversely, contrarily. {2} inversely, in inverted order.
